welcomePage.title: Welcome to SimpleWishlist
welcomePage.description: Create a wishlist, add your wishes and share it with your friends. They will be able to see your wishes and mark them as taken. No more duplicate gifts!
welcomePage.description2: To make things very simple, we don't require any registration. Just create a wishlist, share the link and start adding wishes!
welcomePage.description3: Each user chooses who they are when accessing the wishlist.
welcomePage.description4: Click on the "Create a new Wishlist" button to get started!

createWL.title: Create a new wishlist
createWL.surpriseModeEnabledDescription: Enable or disable the surprise mode functionality for this wishlist. When enabled, users can toggle between seeing and hiding who took care of wishes.
createWL.surpriseModeDescription: In surprise mode, you can not see who took care of your wishes nor taken wishes. It's a surprise!

createWish.name: Name of your wish
createWish.price: Do you know the price for this item?
createWish.url: Where can we find this item?
createWish.description: Describe your wish to help your friends find it

placeholders.name: What is your wish ?
placeholders.description: I already have the 3rd season, I need the 4th one!

suggestWish.selectUser: I want to suggest this wish for
suggestWish.selectUserRequired: Please select a user to suggest this wish for

placeholders.name: Name of a new lucky one

tooltip.otherUserMessage: Click to mark this wish as taken!
tooltip.untake: Click to unmark this wish as taken

WLCreated.name: Name
WLCreated.helpLink: Everyone can now access the wishlist using the same link. When they visit the link, they'll simply choose who they are from the list of participants.
WLCreated.individualLinks: Share this single link with everyone. Each person will select their identity when they first visit the wishlist.
WLCreated.wishlistLinkDescription: Share this link with all participants. Each person will choose who they are when they visit.
WLCreated.copyAllIntro: Here are the links for the wishlist
WLCreated.copyWishlistLinkIntro: Here is the link for the wishlist
WLCreated.wishlistLinkInstructions: Everyone uses the same link! When you visit the link, simply choose who you are from the participants list.
WLCreated.copyAllReminder: It is very important that everyone uses their personal link, at the risk of modifying someone else's wishlist, or ruining the surprise!

showWL.emptyWishlistText: Time to add your first wish! ✨
showWL.clickToAddFirstWish: Click here to add a wish

userSelection.choiceWillBeRemembered: Your choice will be remembered for this wishlist
userSelection.errorLoadingUsers: Could not load users for this wishlist
userSelection.errorAuthenticating: Could not authenticate with this user

wishlistName.required: Your wishlist must have a name

otherUsersNames.required: We need at least one person
otherUsersNames.noDuplicate: All names in the wishlist must be different.

wishUrl.correctUrl: Please enter a valid URL, starting with http:// or https://
wishUrl.maxLength: The URL can be 200 characters max. Use tinyurl.com to shorten it if needed.

wishName.required: Your wish must have a name

wishPrice.maxChar: The price can be 15 characters max

errors.minWishlistUsers: At least one user must be added to the wishlist
errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.404: The page you are looking for does not exist.
errors.404explanation: You may have mistyped the address or the page may have moved.
